src:
Data dan Fakta La Liga: Levante vs Barcelona
01 Nov 2019, 16:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona akan main tandang melawan Levante pada pekan ke-12 La Liga 2019/20, Sabtu (02/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi pertandingan di Ciutat de Valencia ini.
Dalam laga tandangnya melawan Levante di La Liga musim lalu, Barcelona menang telak 5-0 lewat gol-gol Luis Suarez dan Gerard Pique, serta hat-trick Lionel Messi. Levante kehilangan Erick Cabaco yang dikartu merah di menit 76.
Barcelona mencatatkan 5 clean sheet dalam 7 laga terakhirnya melawan Levante di semua kompetisi.
Barcelona memenangi 17 dari 21 laga terakhirnya melawan Levante di semua kompetisi, kandang dan tandang (M17 S2 K2).
Barcelona hanya kalah 2 kali dalam 26 pertemuan dengan Levante di La Liga (M20 S4 K2), dan keduanya didapatkan di kandang Levante, yakni 1-5 pada musim 1964/65 dan 4-5 pada musim 2017/18.
Barcelona selalu mencetak 2 gol atau lebih dalam 7 dari 8 laga terakhirnya melawan Levante di La Liga.
Barcelona selalu mencetak 2 gol atau lebih dalam 4 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Levante di La Liga.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
La Liga data and facts: Levante vs Barcelona
Nov 01 2019, 16:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona will play away to Levante in the 12th week of La Liga 2019/20, Saturday (11/02/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the match at Ciutat de Valencia.
In their away game against Levante in La Liga last season, Barcelona won a landslide 5-0 win over goals by Luis Suarez and Gerard Pique, as well as Lionel Messi's hat-trick. Levante lost Erick Cabaco, who was red-carded in the 76th minute.
Barcelona have kept 5 clean sheets in their last 7 matches against Levante in all competitions.
Barcelona have won 17 of their last 21 matches against Levante in all competitions, home and away (M17 S2 K2).
Barcelona have only lost 2 of their 26 meetings with Levante in La Liga (M20 S4 K2), and both were found at home to Levante, 1-5 in the 1964/65 season and 4-5 in the 2017/18 season.
Barcelona has always scored 2 or more goals in 7 of its last 8 matches against Levante in La Liga.
Barcelona has always scored 2 or more goals in its last 4 away games against Levante in La Liga.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
